name: Tap Blocks Out: 3D Puzzle Game
description:
Are you looking for a fun and brain-training game? Do you want to challenge yourself in a game? Or maybe you just want to find a way to relax during your leisure time? Tap Blocks Out will satisfy most of your imagination! You can get a lot of fantastic experiences in this 3D puzzle game!

HOW TO PLAY
1. TAP on the blocks with the arrow. The blocks can only fly away in the direction of the arrow.
2. You can ROTATE the cube to find the correct unlockable box.
3. You need to clear all the blocks in a limited number of MOVES.
4. When you've rescued all the squares, congratulations on COMPLETING the level!

FEATURES
1. 3D graphic visuals and excellent sound effects.
2. Relieve your stress and get relaxation.
3. Train your logical thinking and spatial imagination.
4. Customize your themes and various shapes of the blocks.
5. Challenge a variety of different difficulty levels.
6. Experience Endless Mode.
7. Block puzzle game for all ages.

What are you hesitating for? Download and play now! Help the cube escape and start your amazing journey!
